features: 【QUICK & EASY】: Ideal for New Year gifts! Using the right tool for any job makes life better and our 3 Pack dust pans with brush is the right cleaning tool for cleaning up. The bristles whisk broom grab everything in its wake and the rubber edge of the dustpan makes all the difference. Perfect for a quick clean up.

【ALL FIT】: Great for car cleaning. Soft dust brush works great for keeping dust off matte finish dash and door panels. Small bamboo handle broom is stiff enough for brushing grass, sand and small pebbles out of carpet in between vacuuming. Perfect for tent cleanliness management.Pick up sand, dirt and gravel out of tent easily!

【LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN】: The small broom and dustpan set made with high quality PET fibers,chenille and bamboo. Very lightweight and easy to clean up crumbs or fur. At the same time, our mini broom and dustpan set is also a good choice for children to join the family cleaning.

【EFFICIENT SIZE】: Dustpan - 12.8"*8.8", Bamboo Brush- 11.2"*3.2", Chenille Dust Brush - 13.2"*5.2". Bamboo brush can snaps into dustpan for storage, all can hang. Very suitable for dusting electronics; TV, printer, modem, pet house, sofa, desk, bed,etc. Just the right size for small jobs.

【INSTANT HELP & SERVICE FOR YOU】: MASTERTOP 3 PACK Dustpan and Brush Set covers with 30-day return back, 1-year replacement. Please searching for our customer support online,pls click "Contact Seller". You can get 24-hour customer-service help and a satisfied solution if you encounter any problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serves it’s purpose well
reviews.reviewText: Good quality. I use it around our fireplace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Nice Dust Pan ComboErgonomic brush, is at first glance the best piece of the comboBRUSH:1. Elevated (angled) handle to make it easier to sweep without crouching real low to floor surface.2. Slight hindrance to bench top sweeping with the angled handle.3. Bought this for quick spot sweeping of broken glasses or small debris on floor and seems good so far.4. Bristles are stiff, but soft.5. Bristles are frayed or (split-end hair like) so as to sweep finer dust.6. Good enough craftsmanship in the wood stain and finish.7. Seems durable enough to last for years.DUST PAN:1. Once again the weaker link of the combo2. Light weight - could be an asset or it could be a liability (like it's flimsy and going to break under pressure)3. The leading edge rubber strip seems too scant to stay on the pan or press against the ground.4. Leading edge of rubber might actually tear under vigorous use.. (time will tell how durable it is)All in all , I am not as disappointed with the combo now that I've used it a little while rather than when I 1st opened box ..Ok, I love the brush and the price wasn't that bad for just the brush alone, and the pan could be better but is good enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: This was exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this package is worth it just for the dust broom.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this package deal mainly for the wooden dust broom. I have to say I am very pleased with the quality of the dust broom. The dust pan on the other-hand is simple/ thin black plastic, a bit of a disappointment. A nice metal dust pan or something made from wood would have been nice to see. I for one get frustrated and displeased if all my cleaning supplies are made from cheap plastic. I would rather pay more and have metal or wood. This is the entire reason I bought the dust broom because it is wooden. I ordered a separate dust pan made of metal and in the end got what I was looking for. Too bad I had to buy items I won't use to get there. I may use the other duster , not sure if it will work for my needs. Dusting is usually over tiny delicate things, and this duster is large. Good for ledges or windowsills or the like? Like to add aditional info the fact that the brissels are not made from plastic is such a nice feature and makes sweeping up dust so much better. Natural fiber all the way, makes a big difference. Esp sweeping up loose dog fur . I sweep almost everyday in the summer. My dog sheds. This dust broom is a dream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweeping and cleaning dusting set
reviews.reviewText: If you take cleaning seriously and you have a home you look after these answered my calls for those such light duties. I can seamlessly transfer from brushing a bed line to cleaning a window and then dusting the hard to reach areas like behind television. I bought it with the Amazon store because they offered a coupon of 5% off well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy Cleaning Tools that Perform Great!
reviews.reviewText: I’m staying with some guy friends while I work an out-of-state assignment this summer. In some regards, they’re your stereotype bachelors. After a fruitless search, it became apparent that the house was lacking a dedicated interior broom/dustpan set and there certainly wasn’t a microfiber duster to be found. I selected these because they look cool and sorta have a masculine guy vibe (don’t want to tornado them with rose gold and lilac cleaning supplies). I can’t stand plasticly generic looking supplies, even those that are relegated to an utility closet. These appear more old fashioned or classic.The tools all work really well! The duster is particularly useful for the leather couches as well as the various antique woodwork that’s original to the house. The broom is ideal for countertops or accessing those hard to reach corners. It’s also fairly easy to clean the bristles. (Haven’t tried cleaning the duster yet.) I would definitely buy this set again!
